Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: MickeSweden
Reviews.Content: simple hotel location minutes walk roma termini hotel bit outdated worn clean acceptable breakfast included basic bread boiled egg yoghurt cereals fine staff helpful pleasant recommendations restaurants request price location staff breakfast included hotel budget stay couple days rome

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: rzg
Reviews.Content: plan stay offered hotel reservations dest airport flight home cancelled spend extra 3 days rome single clean decor bathroom breakfast staff helpfull spoke fluent english unlike rome internet free 5€ 12 hours fast connectivity recommend

Reviews.Title: “not more than 2 stars”

Reviews.Content: booked night sister hotel hotel champagne park due lack wifi booking hotelscom transfered hotel champagne garden termini station closed station probably wifi expensive paid separately top overpriced hotel leaking radiator bathroom rude receptionist refused unless goes checks leak apologies inspection moved twin double paid floor bathroom dirty sticky walls dirty seriously require proper painting afraid complain receptionist rude accommodation rome overlooking banquet hall window probably enter fortunately havent events breakfast poor coffee disgusting 3 hotels 4 avoid
